net.bytebuddy.implementation.bind.annotation

注释类型 Pipe


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
public @interface Pipe

    A target method parameter that is annotated with this annotation allows to forward an intercepted method invocation to another instance. The instance to which a method call is forwarded must be of the most specific type that declares the intercepted method on the intercepted type.

    Unfortunately, before Java 8, the Java Class Library does not define any interface type which takes a single Object type and returns another Object type. For this reason, a Pipe.Binder needs to be installed explicitly and registered on a MethodDelegation. The installed type is allowed to be an interface without any super types that declares a single method which maps an Object type to a another Object type as a result value. It is however not prohibited to use generics in the process.

    另请参阅:
    MethodDelegation, TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      boolean serializableProxy
      Determines if the generated proxy should be Serializable.

    • 元素详细资料

      • serializableProxy

        public abstract boolean serializableProxy
        Determines if the generated proxy should be Serializable.
        返回:
        true if the generated proxy should be Serializable.
        默认值:
        false
